comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: Now if my granny's cousin is in the 1938 electoral roll as a "hulk operator",  what does that mean ?  Work on one of these old ships ?

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/mich2009] I asked one of our Senior Archivists in Public Access about this; she hasn't come across the term "hulk operator" before. It is also not listed in the "Dictionary of old trades & occupations". 

If there are any occupations/trades experts out there, perhaps you can help with this definition?

AB
